org.dynalang.dynalink.support

Class AbstractRelinkableCallSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.invoke.CallSite
      • java.lang.invoke.MutableCallSite
        • org.dynalang.dynalink.support.AbstractRelinkableCallSite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RelinkableCallSite
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChainedCallSite, MonomorphicCallSite

    public abstract class AbstractRelinkableCallSite
extends java.lang.invoke.MutableCallSite
implements RelinkableCallSite
    A basic implementation of the RelinkableCallSite as a MutableCallSite subclass.
    Author:
    Attila Szegedi

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle relinkAndInvoke)
        Description copied from interface: RelinkableCallSite
        Initializes the relinkable call site by setting a relink-and-invoke method handle. The call site implementation is supposed to set this method handle as its target.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface RelinkableCallSite
        Parameters:
        relinkAndInvoke - a relink-and-invoke method handle supplied by the DynamicLinker.
